title: Juventus Stadium - Wikipedia
snippet: Juventus Stadium (Italian pronunciation: [juˈvɛntus ˈstaːdjum]), known for sponsorship reasons as the Allianz Stadium since July 2017, sometimes simply known in Italy as the Stadium (Italian: Lo Stadium), is an all-seater football stadium in the Vallette borough of Turin, Italy, and the ...

title: Allianz Stadium Juventus
snippet: Allianz Stadium, the home of Juventus FC and Bianconeri. Directions and access, accreditation and welcoming activities.

title: Our Home: Allianz Stadium Juventus
snippet: Discover more about the Allianz Stadium, the home of Juventus Football Club, a real black and white jewel.

title: Where is Juventus Stadium: Home of Juventus FC and Iconic Venue for Major Football Events on Map Lat Long Coordinates
snippet: Juventus Stadium, also known as Allianz Stadium, is a world-class sports venue located in the Area12 Shopping Center at Corso Gaetano Scirea, 50, Torino, Italy. With a seating capacity of 41,507, this state-of-the-art stadium offers an exceptional experience for football fans and visitors alike.

title: Allianz Stadium (Juventus Stadium) - Turin - The Stadium Guide
snippet: Allianz Stadium, previously known as Juventus Stadium, replaced Juventus’ old Stadio Delle Alpi, which had only been the home of the club since 1990.
